column1:
The Corona Virus death rate in China is really ~8.8%!!!

Here's the math:

China stats (see link below):
Total confirmed:        80,413
Totaled Recovered:   27,904
Total Deaths:                 2,708

Death Rate:  2,708 / (27,904+2,708) = 8.8%

(continued)
